title: The Lance of Power
description: Fantasy EroticaBONUS BOOK (Includes The Victory of the Divine Queen)The women of the dead king were gathered about his body. "Strip them!" cried Isis, eager to degrade her captives. To avoid dishonor, the Queen disrobed, folllowed by her daughters.Isis then ordered the naked women marched thru the streets to the slave pens. There they would be well used by our warriors.Thus it was in the days of the Dark Empire.(Partial -The King of the Two Lands - The Favored One - and In the Manner of our Ancestors)4/2014
author: Jerome Brooke
